entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wasagaming
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
